column2: Jenkins is an open source continuous integration (CI) and continuous delivery (CD) tool written in Java. It helps automate the software development process and enables developers to build, test, and deploy code with ease. Jenkins can automatically detect code changes and trigger builds, tests, and deployments, as well as monitor their execution. Additionally, Jenkins integrates with a wide variety of tools and plugins to allow easier integration into other development and operations tools.

Gluten sensitivity is a condition where people experience digestive issues when consuming foods containing gluten, a protein found in wheat, rye, and barley. Symptoms may include abdominal bloating, abdominal pain, diarrhea, constipation, and fatigue, among others.
